alert.note: Alert for North Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; South Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 30 at 2:49PM MDT until August 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zone....283. In North Central WY Fire Zones...275...282. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. In North Central WY...Big Horn...Hot Springs...Park...Washakie. * IMPACTS: Strong west to southwest wind, low humidity, and above normal temperatures will create erratic fire behavior with existing fires or any new starts. * WIND: West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the 80s to lower 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity... and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: North Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; South Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
